attributes.action: Enable negotiations between UKR/RUS, cease the false narrative & stop the dying.
attributes.additional_details: The best way to help ukraine is to stop prolonging the bloodshed, and play our part to facilitate the fairest peace that can be achieved. This will be a bitter pill to swallow for the west, but it is now obvious, if it wasn't before, that there are no other options and each day costs more lives.
attributes.background: Despite best intentions, the War is lost and each day means less territory and less lives left in Ukraine - escalating to increase negotiating leverage will never work and puts us at risk of devastation.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for a similar action: 

Seek to start peace talks between Russia and Ukraine 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702643
